verbs.description: PARK CITY , Utah ( AP ) — [ARG0: He] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: called] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARG2: ‘ ‘ a con man] , ’’ but Mitt Romney on Thursday night predicted that Trump would ‘ ‘ easily ’’ win his party ’s presidential nomination in 2020 and ‘ ‘ solidly ’’ win a second term . Romney , the GOP ’s failed 2012 presidential nominee from Massachusetts , now a Republican Senate candidate in Utah , made the prediction as he welcomed dozens of high - profile business and political leaders to a mountainside retreat ...
